subject: Re: [junit] How do I submit code which I think should be added to JUnit?
msgSnippet: ... I can understand why they provide the code, but than I _really_ don t understand why they bother setting the cvs tree! ... I am not completely conviced by
messageBody:
> As far as I know, Kent and Erich don't accept code for JUnit.

I can understand why they provide the code, but than I _really_ don't
understand why they bother setting the cvs tree!

> They are, however, open to suggestions. I suggest emailing Kent or Erich directly.

I am not completely conviced by that. I've sent _several_ mails without
getting answers...

Vladimir
